name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lawyer Yi Shenghua said that his Weibo post exposing funeral homes in many places reselling corpses is no longer visible

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed their own Bangladesh student protest mashup video to pay tribute to the heroic Bangladeshi people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, all topics related to "Thousands of bodies in Taiyuan, Shanxi being resold as materials" have been banned on all platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Sina News, the manipulator behind the scenes, Li Baoxing, was the actual person in charge and directed all illegal activities. He was once awarded the title of "National Model Worker"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/L3QXuNW68c

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the domestic news related to "stealing corpses" has begun to "surround the United States to save Zhao"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of August 9, a container on a cargo ship exploded in the Beilun Port area of Ningbo, Zhejiang, Zhoushan Port. A mushroom cloud rose at the scene. According to reports, no casualties were reported so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 8 (Released) Beijing. A woman posted a video to report her husband (Zhang Jixing, the detective of the Economic Investigation Brigade of the Chaoyang Branch of the Beijing Public Security Bureau) for abusing his power to accept huge bribes, committing long-term domestic violence, and keeping a mistress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 9, Yan'an, Shaanxi. After heavy rain, cars piled up and were washed away in Zhidan County. Many cars were soaked in water and covered with mud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Huzhou City, Zhejiang Province, a man stabbed himself several times on the street, and the police worked together to subdue him on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 8, the lawyer who exposed the theft and resale of corpses spoke out, revealing that many media outlets contacted him that day, including reporters from AFP and the Wall Street Journal. He said he would not accept interviews from foreign media, only central media. "My goal is to promote supervision and legislation. I don't want to die without a complete body in the future."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 8, a magnitude 7.1 earthquake occurred near Kyushu Island, Japan, and netizens inside the Great Firewall left messages expressing gloating.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 7, a judge in Luohe, Henan was murdered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 8 (Released) Siping, Jilin. A man who claimed to be a cadre of the Discipline Inspection Commission of Siping, Jilin, said that he had been wrongly convicted and had no place to file a lawsuit, and the local court also rejected his appeal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 8, the U.S. Embassy in China published a message congratulating the U.S. swimming team for their outstanding performance at the Paris Olympics and accompanying it with photos of the athletes. In response, netizens commented that the U.S. had photoshopped the athletes' faces from purple to white.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, Han Xu, a doctor of law, wrote: The public may not know the details of the "case of trafficking corpses and their body parts" too early. He believes that as a legal researcher, we should look at the issues related to this incident rationally: first, the issue of the boundaries of lawyers' speech outside the court; second, the issue of the impact on the police's independent handling of cases in accordance with the law; third, the issue of protecting the personal information of criminal suspects.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As the topic of "reselling corpses" fermented, in the morning of August 9, orthopedic material concept stocks opened higher collectively, and Zhenghai Bio and other stocks reached their daily limit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 8, the Housing Bureau of Hefei City, Anhui Province issued the "Initiative on Standardizing New Media Network Communication Behavior in the Real Estate Industry". The initiative mentioned: constantly taking things out of context, generalizing and exaggerating the advantages and disadvantages of the real estate market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 6, some netizens complained on Sichuan Government, calling for the rectification of cosplay, saving young people, promoting Chinese culture, and returning Chengdu to a pure land.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Selling a car results in an average loss of 10,000 yuan, and nine Beijing Hyundai dealers jointly requested to suspend car pick-up. 
On August 8, a document from a Hunan Beijing Hyundai dealer to Beijing Hyundai circulated on the Internet. The letter said: In view of the huge inventory pressure, very difficult operation, and very serious losses of all dealers in Hunan Province, starting from August 8, all Hunan dealers will suspend car pick-up from Beijing Hyundai and will no longer accept vehicles delivered automatically. 
A local dealer said that the store sells more than ten cars a month, but the manufacturer's car pick-up task is about 10 to 30 cars per month. As a result, more and more vehicles are piled up in dealer inventory. At present, the average loss for each car sold is roughly between 5,000 and 15,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @sunwear_cn @mranti fake, far inferior to Weibo

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 5, the Xicheng District People's Court of Beijing issued an announcement stating that a factory building with a market value of 130 million yuan was sold for 1 yuan, and the final selling price was only 18,000 yuan. The price per square meter was not enough to buy two steamed buns.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 7, Suzhou, Jiangsu. A 63-year-old man said in an interview that his monthly pension of 18,000 yuan "can't be used up anyway, I'm just an ordinary person." Regarding marriage, the old man said that he has a lot of ideas about many young people not getting married and having children nowadays. "No matter how successful your career is, it's not right (not getting married). Marriage and career are not contradictory. 
As of now, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Weibo user named "Lu Yun Xiao Tongxue" said that she did not owe a penny but JD Finance came to her house to collect debts. According to the user, she applied for a broadband card at the end of last year, and then she received a debt collection text message from JD Finance. After the woman complained, JD Finance customer service said it was because the previous owner of the broadband card owed money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 7, Xianyang, Shaanxi. A netizen posted a video saying that he went to the Liquan County Traffic Police Brigade to do some work, and from 8:30 to 9:00, the staff were playing games in the office.
The netizen replied, "Isn't this a real combat simulation? How can it be a game?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 7, Yunnan Baiyao issued an announcement stating that Yunnan state-owned assets will be no more than 1 billion yuan and plan to increase its holdings in Yunnan Baiyao.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 8, the interim government of Bangladesh, led by Nobel Peace Prize winner Yunus, was sworn in.
